package.name: opensky/runtime-config-bundle
package.description: This bundle provides a way to inject parameters into services at runtime by exposing a RuntimeParameterBag service, which functions exactly like Symfony2's own ParameterBags.

dev-master.name: opensky/runtime-config-bundle
dev-master.description: This bundle provides a way to inject parameters into services at runtime by exposing a RuntimeParameterBag service, which functions exactly like Symfony2's own ParameterBags.
